Posted By: TheWrathofShane (11/4/2013 12:26:03 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Basically a much more powerful and free version of Zuran Orb. That you can sacrifice any permanent gives you an outlet for all of your permanents if you need it, so long as there's a creature in play. He has the normal starting hand size and a substantial increase to life in addition to his inherent tankiness. He does nothing inherently broken, like a couple of the others do.  
Interestingly enough, though, his ability does nothing if your opponent is using the [Ertai](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ertai) vanguard.
